item.title: How do i change the exp?
item.dc:creator: @fishys fishys
item.description:
@fishys wrote:

Ok i will tell you a easier way i guess
Go onto your server and clikc a stone or whatever and see how much exp you get
Go into your client.java and type in that number
If you find soemthing that looks like the exp, change it to whatever you want
Hope i solved your endless problem lol

item.title: How do i change the exp?
item.dc:creator: @fishys fishys
item.description:
@fishys wrote:

Step 1: Go into your cleint.java and search "Public boolean AttackNPC
Step 2: Scroll down until you see something like (8000*Hitdiff)attack or something like that, it could be any number i just made up 8000
Step 3: Change the 8000 to any number u want the exp to be then save, compile done
Hope i helped

Read full topic
